articles.description: Phil Foden's "masterclass" against Aston Villa again underlines his "precious value" to Manchester City, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: 'Special Foden steals show in absence of Haaland & De Bruyne'

articles.description: Arsenal overcome the absence of Bukayo Saka to move back to the top of the Premier League table with victory over struggling Luton at Emirates Stadium.
articles.title: Arsenal return to top with victory over Luton

articles.description: Phil Foden struck a stunning hat-trick as Manchester City continued to apply pressure to their Premier League title rivals.
articles.title: Foden scores hat-trick as Man City beat Villa

articles.description: Bayer Leverkusen set up a German Cup final with FC Kaiserslautern by thrashing second-tier Fortuna Dusseldorf in their semi-final.
articles.title: Leverkusen thrash Dusseldorf to reach German Cup final

articles.description: Paris St-Germain will face Lyon in the French Cup final after Kylian Mbappe's goal helps them edge out Rennes in their semi-final.
articles.title: Mbappe hits winner as PSG reach French Cup final

articles.description: Rory McIlroy reveals he had a lesson with Tiger Woods' former coach Butch Harmon in his search for form prior to next week's Masters.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy: World number two consults Tiger Woods' ex-coach Butch Harmon before Masters

articles.description: Joel Embiid says his experience with a recent knee injury was "disappointing and depressing" after marking his comeback by scoring 24 points as the Philadelphia 76erbeat the Oklahoma City Thunder.
articles.title: Embiid reveals knee injury ‘took a toll mentally’

articles.description: Find out the in depth batting and bowling figures for New Zealand Women v England Women in the Women's One Day International Series on BBC Sport.
articles.title: New Zealand Women v England Women - Cricket - BBC Sport

articles.description: Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag warns top players' performances are dropping off because they are "overloaded".
articles.title: Player workloads affecting performances, warns Ten Hag

articles.description: The ex-president of the Spanish football federation was arrested in Madrid, before being released.
articles.title: Luis Rubiales arrested in corruption investigation
